name: Rainjade Statuette: Tender Discourse
description: A strangely shaped stone carving that imitates the form of the Carefree Simulacra scattered throughout Chenyu Vale. It appears nearly identical to the originals, besides possessing no magical power whatsoever.\nIt is said that these stone carvings were first made by the ancestors of the people of Chenyu Vale, but none can say why they chose such a shape, or why this shape gives people a carefree feeling...
